name: ForceSlinger(Demo)
description:
ForceSlinger is a 2D platformer that is mostly based in physics. It also contains action/shooter elements too. The game is currently a demo. A mouse is recommended for fun experience, but not necessary to complete the game.

---Features---

  • momentum/acceleration based movement
  • other areas of physics (currently only Kinematics)
  • collect powerups
  • special areas with more challenge
  • bosses to defeat (some are based on physics experiments)
  • a points system that ranks your performance (like a retro game)
  • progress saving (up to three saves)

---Update 0.11---

  • added a Minimap to the pause menu
  • take screenshots with the "Screenshot" key (default is f12)

---Known bugs---

  • Binding "Start" and "Cancel" buttons to the same keys will cause pause to not work.
  • Resizing the window while in the title screen will cause the title to be positioned improperly.
